submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, ha: List[int], va: List[int]) -> int:
        r, c = 1, 1
        ha = [-x for x in ha]
        va = [-x for x in va]
        heapq.heapify(ha)
        heapq.heapify(va)
        ans = 0
        while ha and va:
            if -ha[0] > -va[0]:
                v = -heapq.heappop(ha)
                ans += v * c
                r += 1
            else:
                v = -heapq.heappop(va)
                ans += v * r
                c += 1
        while ha:
            v = -heapq.heappop(ha)
            ans += v * c
            r += 1
        while va:
            v = -heapq.heappop(va)
            ans += v * r
            c += 1
        return ans
